metadata.title: Ecology of the Bering Sea: A Review of Russian Literature

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks, Sea Grant College Program

metadata.description: To make available the results of Russian studies of the Bering Sea ecosystem to North American scientists not conversant in the Russian language. The book is the result of a contract signed in July 1993 between the US Dept. of State and the school of Fisheries and Ocean Science, University of Alaska, Fairbanks.  Dr. O.A. Mathisen became the principle investigator of this joint US - Russia Bering Sea Studies project.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To make available the results of Russian studies of the Bering Sea ecosystem to North American scientists not conversant in the Russian language. The book is the result of a contract signed in July 1993 between the US Dept. of State and the school of Fisheries and Ocean Science, University of Alaska, Fairbanks.  Dr. O.A. Mathisen became the principle investigator of this joint US - Russia Bering Sea Studies project.
